statements.statements: for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="event") then ($evt.agent=true;$evt.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$evt.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="netview") then ($net.agent=true;$net.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$net.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="vsamin") then ($vsi.agent=true;$vsi.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$vsi.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="vsamout") then ($vso.agent=true;$vso.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$vso.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="problem") then ($sca.prob.active=true;$sca.prob.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$sca.prob.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="spool") then ($sca.spool.active=true;$sca.spool.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$sca.spool.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="SCEMAIL" or 4 in $i in $sca.processes="scemail") then ($sce.agent=true;$sce.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$sce.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$sce.pid=2 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))

for $i = 1 to lng(denull($sca.processes)) do (if (4 in $i in $sca.processes="SCAuto Server" or 4 in $i in $sca.processes="scauto") then ($sca.agent=true;$sca.last=1 in $i in $sca.processes;$sca.idle=5 in $i in $sca.processes;$sca.pid=2 in $i in $sca.processes;$i=lng(denull($sca.processes))))
